page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A BOY
page.content: In the morning my daddy woke me up and I got washed and dressed then I went down stairs and had a cup of tea. Then it was 8.30 about time to go to school.I got my school things and got in the car and daddy took me. When I got to school some of my friends were already there so we played a game until the bell went at 8.55.Then we went in side and had hymn practice after this we were told our week's work and we started on it.We have been doing a project about famous musicians. In mathematics we have been investigating cuboids. At dinner time I went to the hall and ate the meal prepared by Mrs. Palmer in the school kitchen. It was roast pork, potatoes, carrots and cabbage followed by marshmallow tart.
